group_1.textLeft: Like Tsukuyo, I came from a well-established@family in Mizuna.
So I had no freedom at all, even when I was@very young.
That's why I always yearned to be free from@my family.
I wanted to have as much liberty as the kids@from other families.

group_1.textCenter: I can deeply relate to that...

group_1.textLeft: And so that was how I was when Kyubey@appeared before me.
It was easy enough to think up a wish.
"I want to be free."
But I didn't manage to have that wish@granted.
Well, back then...
I didn't have the drive to make use of my@freedom.
I'd lived completely bound by my parents'@orders...that life was all I knew.
What would I even do if I were free?
So I wished for something else.
"I wish that I could at least be free in my@dreams."
So, I received the power to dream as freely@as I liked...
It's essentially the power to cast illusions@over myself.
However, by becoming a Magical Girl...
I was shocked to discover I had made myself@more abnormal than I ever was before.

group_1.textRight: You shouldn't let that get you down!

group_1.textCenter: You will be able to be a normal young@woman.

group_1.textLeft: You're right.

group_1.textCenter: And what is more, the Witches and [textBlue:Rumors]@are progressing wonderfully!

group_1.textRight: Once you let her know the truth, there's@no way she won't join us!

group_1.textLeft: I'd like to think that...
(I don't think Yachan will come with me.)
(She'd never forgive what I've become.)
